title: 500-700 Latency

embed.description: Test your mobile network speed, wherever you may be. Download the free Ookla Speedtest app for iOS, Amazon, Android or Windows Phone.

body: I've been playing for years and never had latency problems until last night pre-patch. Shut it down after one match, then tried this morning and it's the same thing. Averaging 500ms and spiking to 700+. NOTHING has changed on my end and my speed tests are good. What happened and how do I fix it?

replies.body: A sudden rise in ping like this can be due to a network problem staying connected to the game server, or other issues like how your ISP is routing to us.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as your first step to resolve anything that might be causing connection issues locally.  Hopefully, this will fix the ping issue!
